public static <T> T createProxy(T underlying,
                           Class<T> notUsed,
                           GenericInvocationHandler<T> invocationHandler)
        Deprecated. use createProxy(Object, GenericInvocationHandler) instead

      • createProxy

        public static <T> T createProxy(T underlying,
                GenericInvocationHandler<T> invocationHandler)
        Creates a proxy for the given object delegating all method calls to the invocation handler. The proxy will implement all interfaces implemented by the object to be proxied.
        Parameters:
        underlying - the object to proxy
        invocationHandler - the invocation handler
        Returns:

      • isProxy

        public static boolean isProxy(Object obj)
        Used to determine is a given object is a Proxy created by this proxy factory.
        Parameters:
        obj - the object in question
        Returns:
        true if it is a proxy - false otherwise

      • isProxy

        public static boolean isProxy(Class<?> clazz)
        Used to determine if the given class is a proxy class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class in question
        Returns:
        true if proxy - false otherwise
